outputs.output_descr: 1. To creat and maintain an enabling environment for effective and sustainable conservation of natural wetlands at all levels. 2. Planning and land use decision-making of wetlands conservation agencies at all levels is enhanced through provision of comprehensive, current wetlands information, decision support system. 3.National Wetlands Conservation strategy (NWCS) is developed, officially adopted & implemented at all levels.4. Nation-wide awareness campaign designed and implemented.5.Wetlands biodiversity sustainably conserved in Central Indus Wetlands and Salt Range Wetlands Complex by designing and implementing comprehensive management plan.6. Wetlands biodiversity sustainably conserved in the North-west Alpine Wetlands Complex.

project_descr: Protection and Management of Pakistan Wetlands Project
